text: findings the general court finds that the rapid expansion of broadband is critical to new hampshire citizens during the pandemic due to the reliance on distance learning for education and the reliance on telemedicine for health care new paragraph public utilities pole attachments broadband access amend rsa by inserting after paragraph viii the following new paragraph where a pole replacement is necessary for make ready to accommodate the provisioning of broadband services in areas that have no infrastructure capable of delivering internet access with service that has a minimum download speed of mbps and is symmetrical the pole owner shall pay the replacement cost proportionate to the age of the pole based on the average life of a pole
